newsitem.title: USA: Aquagenix names CEO of largest unit.
newsitem.headline: Aquagenix names CEO of largest unit.

text.p: Aquagenix Inc on Wednesday said it named John Hart as the president and chief executive of Aquagenix Land-Water Technologies Inc, the company's largest subsidiary.

Hart, most recently a senior management executive with the international engineering consulting firm of Metcalf & Eddy, also worked at the brokerage firm Merrill Lynch for 25 years, the company said in a statement.
His appointment "firmly positions us to capture a meaningful share of the out-sourcing marketplace for municipal services," said Andrew Chesler, chief executive officer of Aquagenix Inc.
Aquagenix Inc provides aquatic and industrial vegetation management services to commercial, private, governmental and utility customers.
